133278.Name: Jackie Chan's J-Mat
133278.Overview: Jackie Chan J-Mat, is a DanceDanceRevolution-inspired device you spread out on the floor in front of your TV. It comes with the game cartridge, the dance pad, and two-pound hand weights for added resistance. The game offers an aerobic workout with Jackie Chan as your personal instructor with three levels of difficulty. In the Vigorous Step, dancing portion, you can have fun while trying to match the music pattern in screen with the dance mat. There are also various levels of difficulty. In the Jackieâ€™s Action Run, you will become Jackie Chan and travel through the streets of Hong Kong in a five-minute workout, which includes walking, running, jumping, squats and side-steps. There are three intensity levels to choose from. The dash and reflex modes of the game are designed to test and improve your agility and reaction time.

133279.Name: Bowling
133279.Overview: Lifelike Bowling Action You control the amount of hook on each release. Realistic graphics and stereo sound put you in the bowling alley. Customize your Players Create up to 8 players that you can name. Customize your game by creating different bowling techniques and hooking styles. Multiple game Modes Choose from one of three different game modes. - Against the Clock - Panel Crusher - Moving Pins.

133284.Name: Tennis
133284.Overview: Lifelike Tennis Action Serve volley and play like a pro with wireless XaviXTechnology. Lifelike graphics and stereo sound put you on center court.* Select your Players Choose from 20 different tennis opponents. Select your favorite player with varying skill sets playing styles and power settings.* Multiple Court Styles Play on grass clay or hard court by choosing one of the 4 different tennis courts.* Player vs. Player Play by yourself or doubles with a friend. Choose from one of two different game modes. - Tournament - Exhibition.

133286.Name: Music & Circuit
133286.Overview: Allows you to connect a portable music player, CD/MD player, or compact audio system to the XaviX PORT for a workout that moves to your music. Modes include: Music Exercises, Circuit Exercises and Aerobic Exercises.

133287.Name: Golf
133287.Overview: Step into the action and onto the green like never before. With this system cartridge wireless driver putter and swing sensor it's just like you're on the course. Go out for 18 holes or take the hole-in-one challenge. Face off against the system or golf with up to three friends. Whatever you choose it's a whole new way to golf. XaviXGOLF includes system cartridge Right-Handed wireless driver Right-Handed putter and swing sensor (batteries not included.) * Test your golf skills with the XaviXGOLF Driver and XaviXGOLF Putter. Wireless swing recognition lets you smash your drive down the middle of fairway and roll your putt in for a birdie. * Play 9 or 18 holes against the customizable system players or play with friends and family. * Select from various golfing modes including Exhibition Tournament or close to the pin. * Stroke Play lets you compete for the best total score or challenge opponents to the best score per hole in Match Play. * Customize the names and characters of up to four golfers check the results of your score card or drop in the Clubhouse to pick up some tips from the pros.

133290.Name: PowerBoxing
133290.Overview:
XaviX Powerboxing Cartridge. For use with XaviX Port gaming system. Experience the ultimate interactive workout with Jackie Chan.
Power up your cardio fitness with a trainer who knows all of the right moves - Jackie Chan.
With this system cartridge and wireless boxing gloves, it's just like you're in the ring.
Jackie will coach you through a training regimen improving your speed and technique, or challenge a series of opponents for the championship title. Whatever you choose, the system will track your workout sessions and calorie burn.

133293.Name: Bassfishing
133293.Overview:
Feels like youâ€™re really out on the lake! XaviX is a unique wireless system that allows for building real skills and works with your bodyâ€™s natural movements. It uses any tv, a XaviX PortÂ®, and a XaviX application cartridge. It is easy to set up and use. No special training is needed. XaviX improves BMR, coordination, balance, strength, agility, cardio, reflexes and more!
XaviX Fishing features 5 tournaments to choose from with 3 levels of difficulty, as well as free fishing mode that allows players to enjoy fishing at their own pace. Cast any way you likeâ€”overhand, from the side or underhand. Includes XaviX Bass FISHING cartridge, and wireless rod with reel and wrist strap.

133299.Name: Lifestyle Manager
133299.Overview: Monitor and measure your lifestyle and health-oriented goals. Step onto the wireless scale and watch as the data is transmitted, updated, analyzed and stored on the system cartridge in the XaviXPORT. Offers tools to analyze and improve your lifestyle including weight trends, BMI, body fat percentage and lifestyle analysis. Provides warm-up, circuit trainings, and cool-down exercises.

133300.Name: Eye/Hand
133300.Overview: A fun "multi-task training" application that stimulates the brain and body to develop powers of judgment, reflexes, and dexterity. This is achieved by reacting to on-screen instructions while performing different actions with the glove sensors on your hands. Includes 2 gloves,system cartridge andsetupguide. XaviXPort required and sold separately.
